item.title: The forefront of chemical engineering research
item.description:
Laura Torrente‐Murciano, Jennifer B. Dunn, Panagiotis D. Christofides, Jay D. Keasling, Sharon C. Glotzer, Sang Yup Lee, Kevin Van Geem, Jean W. Tom, Gaohong He, No host. 1(1)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4390754968
To mark the inaugural issue of Nature Chemical Engineering, we asked a collection of scientists working in different branches of chemical engineering to share their perspectives on the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead for their respective fields.
item.author: Laura Torrente‐Murciano, Jennifer B. Dunn, Panagiotis D. Christofides, Jay D. Keasling, Sharon C. Glotzer, Sang Yup Lee, Kevin Van Geem, Jean W. Tom, Gaohong He
